wikipedia_page.main: Thomas O'Brien (born 7 August 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Scottish Championship side Arbroath as a central defender.

response: The following season they avoided relegation again by defeating local rivals Dunfermline Athletic 4–1 on aggregate in the Championship Play Off final thanks to goals from Kane Hemmings, Greg Stewart and Thomas O'Brien.
*Thomas O'Brien (bishop) (1792–1874), Church of Ireland Bishop of Ossory, Ferns, and Leighlin
